OOC: Pretty creative.

Nightlight didn't say anything but she was smiling shyly to Rodimus.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I was thinking of energon pasta with VaLorion nitrus 
spices(I'm making names up here). It's our version of Italion food 
from Earth. We can top that off with some light ener-gin.
> 
> While he was talking he lit the small mechanism in the center of 
the table. A low light emitted from the "candle." Rodimus was 
attempting to create a romantic feel in the Mess Hall which only had 
dim lights at night.
